problem.markdown:
Cogeneration plants like the Dartmouth powerplant convert __________ energy in the chemical bonds of oil into __________ energy in the steam.
( ) kinetic, potential (x) potential, kinetic ( ) kinetic, kinetic ( ) potential, potential
[explanation] The potential chemical energy in fuel oil is converted to kinetic energy, which in this case is the motion of the molecules in steam. [explanation]
problem.p: Cogeneration plants like the Dartmouth powerplant convert __________ energy in the chemical bonds of oil into __________ energy in the steam.

div.p: The potential chemical energy in fuel oil is converted to kinetic energy, which in this case is the motion of the molecules in steam.
